value.title: Tyler Perry halts £630m film studio build over AI fears
value.excerpt: US film and TV giant Tyler Perry says he's putting a $800m (£630m) expansion of his studio on hold after becoming concerned over new AI technology. He was due to add 12 sound stages to his Atlanta complex, but says he has been put off by the release of OpenAI's video generator Sora.

value.title: Creator of fake Biden robocall demonstrates using AI to impersonate NBC reporter
value.excerpt: Before the New Hampshire primary, Paul Carpenter says he was paid to create a robocall impersonating President Biden urging listeners not to vote. He demonstrated how he uses artificial intelligence to impersonate the voice of NBC News' Alex Seitz-Wald.

value.title: Google Translate vs. ChatGPT: Which One Is the Best Language Translator?
value.excerpt: This first test occurred back in June 2023, making PCMag one of the first to test these supposedly all-knowing, new chatbots for language translation. We asked bilingual speakers of seven languages to blind rank the translation of two paragraphs by Google Translate, ChatGPT, Gemini (then known as Bard), and Copilot (then Microsoft Bing Chat).
